display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while lying down in the afternoon when circumstances permit
description: Item from the Epworth Sleepiness Scale [Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1798888) [All ESS variables from this study](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/abc/variables?search=epworth)
